title: Can't login to league chat services
body: This morning after I played and ranked game , I got a notification saying I cant login to chat services. I have tried everything please send help

replies.body:
Issues reaching the chat service can be influenced by local network settings or blocked ports on your modem/router. As a first step, I suggest working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), which consolidates the most common solutions for this issue.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
